login.the-host-of-the-game: The host of the game has requested that you enter your email as an identification measure to enter the game
login.modal-verification: The next time you play you won't need to enter your player ID again, so you can log in quickly. You can change it in settings at any time.
login.cant-find-room: We can't find your room, please try again

create-lobby.know-name: Know the name of the person behind the nickname
create-lobby.show-main-board-and-ball: Show main board and balls on gaming devices.
create-lobby.fill-manually: The player you have to fill out your card manually
create-lobby.players-pay-attention: Players have to pay attention to the game
